q: Today, developers, operators and consumers want compelling mobile products which include not only the device, but the software, services, applications and customer support that make a great experience," said Stephen Elop . Nokia and Microsoft will combine our strengths to deliver an ecosystem with unrivalled global reach and scale. It's now a three-horse race. Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer added: I am excited about this partnership with Nokia. Ecosystems thrive when fueled by speed, innovation and scale. The partnership announced today provides incredible scale, vast expertise in hardware

In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly," says Eric Schmidt before adding: I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Together, we see the opportunity, and we have the will, the resources and the drive to succeed, a joint statement from Steve Ballmer and Jobs told the Nokia Conversations website. unfolding in Tahrir Square in central Cairo, stealing eight objects, among which was a statue of King Tutankhamun, according to Zahi Hawass , Egypt's Minister of State for Antiquities. Zahi Hawass described the statue as: a gilded wood statue of the 18th Dynasty king Tutankhamun being carried by a goddess. Apart from this, the eight pieces included "parts of a gilded wood statue of Tutankhamun harpooning". The pieces stolen have been described as being "very valuable", especially so the statue

to their red-hot superstars. Allen Iverson made 16-of-22 shots from the field and Karl Malone was 13-for-20. And many of the shots were alley-oop dunks and rim-rattling jams that were the product of the Nuggets' suddenly stingy defense. They made every shot in the world, Suns coach Mike D'Antoni said. "There was a lot of leaking out of the State Department, and the president knew it. And it was unhelpful. And most of it ended up making the State Department look good.
